Description: On I-495 at mile marker 52.8 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 114 in the County of Albemarle, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The east entrance ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 258 in the City of Newport News, near J Clyde Morris Boulevard, motorists can expect potential delays due to an incident. The east left center lane is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Other Traffic

Description: On I-64 West at mile marker 175.5 in the County of Goochland, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. Traffic backups are approximately 2.0 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
